InstructionData.Instructions:
### Power Management ### alias Self db
# Power Management alias PowerInputAmt r0 # from Cable Analyzer In alias PowerOutputAmt r1 # from Cable Analyzer Out alias CurrentBatteryRatio r2 alias NeedLights r3
# Solar Tracking alias HorizontalAngle r5 alias VerticalAngle r6 alias AdjustedHorizontalAngle r7 alias AdjustedVerticalAngle r8 alias CurrentIrradiance r9
# Device Hashes define CableAnalyzerHash HASH("StructureCableAnalysizer") define CableAnalyzerIn HASH("Cable Analyzer - Power In") define CableAnalyzerOut HASH("Cable Analyzer - Power Out") #define StationBatteryHash HASH("StructureBattery") define StationBatteryHash HASH("StructureBatteryLarge") define SolidGeneratorHash HASH("StructureSolidFuelGenerator") define MediumLEDHash HASH("StructureConsoleLED1x2") define SmallLEDHash HASH("StructureConsoleLED5") define PowerInLED HASH("LED - Power In") define PowerOutLED HASH("LED - Power Out") define DaySensorHash HASH("StructureDaylightSensor") define SolarPanelHash HASH("StructureSolarPanelDual") define SolarPanelHeavyHash HASH("StructureSolarPanelDualReinforced")
# Power Settings define PowerMode 2 # LED Display Mode define MinBatteryRatio 0.2 define MaxBatteryRatio 0.5 define MinIrradiance 1
# Offsets for Solar Panel define PanelHorizontalOffset 90 define PanelVerticalOffset 90
Init: sbn SmallLEDHash PowerInLED Mode PowerMode sbn SmallLEDHash PowerInLED Color Color.Green
sbn SmallLEDHash PowerOutLED Mode PowerMode sbn SmallLEDHash PowerOutLED Color Color.Red
Main: yield jal HandlePowerConsumption jal HandleSolar jal HandleNightLights jal HandleBackupPower j Main
HandlePowerConsumption: lbn PowerInputAmt CableAnalyzerHash CableAnalyzerIn PowerActual Maximum sbn SmallLEDHash PowerInLED Setting PowerInputAmt
lbn PowerOutputAmt CableAnalyzerHash CableAnalyzerOut PowerActual Maximum sbn SmallLEDHash PowerOutLED Setting PowerOutputAmt j ra
HandleSolar: lb HorizontalAngle DaySensorHash Horizontal Maximum lb VerticalAngle DaySensorHash Vertical Maximum
add AdjustedHorizontalAngle HorizontalAngle PanelHorizontalOffset sub AdjustedVerticalAngle PanelVerticalOffset VerticalAngle
sb SolarPanelHash Horizontal AdjustedHorizontalAngle sb SolarPanelHash Vertical AdjustedVerticalAngle sb SolarPanelHeavyHash Horizontal AdjustedHorizontalAngle sb SolarPanelHeavyHash Vertical AdjustedVerticalAngle
# TODO: Pre-orient for morning j ra
HandleNightLights: lb CurrentIrradiance DaySensorHash SolarIrradiance Maximum #s Self Setting CurrentIrradiance # TODO: Handle lights j ra
HandleBackupPower: lb CurrentBatteryRatio StationBatteryHash Ratio Average s Self Setting CurrentBatteryRatio blt CurrentBatteryRatio MinBatteryRatio EnableBackupPower bgt CurrentBatteryRatio MaxBatteryRatio DisableBackupPower j ra
EnableBackupPower: sb SolidGeneratorHash On 1 j ra
DisableBackupPower: sb SolidGeneratorHash On 0 j ra
